video_description: For the amount of money I paid($140 new) this is a great tablet!  The HDMI output is fantastic and can output 720p with no problems and is smooth in playback.  Also thought I'd show the Amiga emulator you can download from the Android Market.
title: Kogan Agora 7" tablet HDMI Demo + Amiga UAE UAE4DROID

comments.text: Yes it does.  Since this video﻿ more affordable tablets have hit the market.  Google Novo 7.
comments.author: Dukeofaust
